ygData.subject: Death of an emissairy
ygData.msgSnippet: Vulois saw the courgae in Child. It was stupidity, but courage as well. But this was his mission. And he was done with it. It was time to give it to another.

Subject: Death of an emissairy
Message-ID: <8re0l2+kdmo@...>

User-Agent: eGroups-EW/0.82

X-Mailer: eGroups Message Poster
From: minime_316@...

Vulois saw the courgae in Child. It was stupidity, but courage as 
well. But this was his mission. And he was done with it. It was time 
to give it to another. He held back Child.

"No Child. This is what I must do. The cycle has come full circle. 
You haven't been realizing it, but you've been training yourself. I 
thought my purpose was too free Cybertron, but I was wrong. That is 
your job, Child. My job was to guide and look after. And now it's 
done. Go to your father Child. Tell him I apologize for keepig him 
from you. Tell him of everything that has happened here. If the 
Skyschorchers and the new three want to go with you, they can, but 
they are not obligated to. Tell Battera and Cybershark the same. They 
are finally free. I just wish I could have said goodbye properly." He 
put a bubble of energy around all the others on his side.

"This will take you out of the mountain safely. I am taking the evil 
ones away with me. Most of them will rot in the pitt forever. If they 
survive, than they will no that Peace conquers evil. Good-bye my 
friends. I hope to see you all in The Matrix some day."

He made the bubble disapear, and it reapeared just outside the 
mountain. He sent a quick thought into all of their minds.

"Go quickly now. There isn't much time. I love you all .good-bye"

He turned his attention to the evil ones.

"Now you will all pay for the things that you have commited." Vulois 
channeled every last piece of energy he had into one system. When he 
set it off, the explosion would be hideous, "There is no time for 
escape now. Computer, 5 second count down to self-destruct. 
Begin....now!"

As the seconds ticked away, so did Vulois' life. 

                          


                          5....4...
